snippet: The automaker is investing in two factories in the Detroit area to build the next-generation Chevrolet Volt hybrid electric car and two unspecified new vehicles.
abstract: General Motors plans to invest $449 million in two factories in Detroit area to build next-generation Chevrolet Volt hybrid electric car and two unspecified new vehicles.
lead_paragraph: The automaker is investing in two factories in the Detroit area to build the next-generation Chevrolet Volt hybrid electric car and two unspecified new vehicles.

headline.main: G.M. to Invest $449 Million in 2 Factories to Build Next Volt
headline.print_headline: G.M. to Invest $449 Million in 2 Factories to Build Next Volt
